Room.Name: Uland Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are west of the main part of the village on Uland Way.
Room.LongDescription: The way is muddy and not very wide, making it difficult to travel along here. A couple of shops are open, but there is also one that has a for sale sign on the door. As you look closer you see in small letters that the previous owner died of the red death, and that the widow is willing to sell cheap. On the south side is Herman's Blacksmith Shop.
